Package org.bukkit.block.data

Interface Rotatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockData, java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Sign
    public interface Rotatable
extends BlockData
    'rotation' represents the current rotation of this block.
